      • fileToWords

        public static java.lang.String[] fileToWords(java.lang.String fileName)
        Reads a text file (such that each line contains a single word), and returns a string array of its lines.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Text file to read.
        Returns:
        Array with the file's content (returns null if the IOException occurred).
